verses.verse: Then went<WH5927> Boaz<WH1162> up<WH5927> to the gate<WH8179>, and sat him down<WH3427> there: and, behold, the kinsman<WH1350> of whom Boaz<WH1162> spake<WH1696> came<WH5674> by; unto whom he said<WH559>, Ho<WH1945>, such<WH6423> a one<WH492>! turn aside<WH5493>, sit down<WH3427> here. And he said<WH559>, I will redeem<WH1350> it. I thought: Heb. I said, I will reveal in thine ear

Then said<WH559> Boaz<WH1162>, What day<WH3117> thou buyest<WH7069> the field<WH7704> of the hand<WH3027> of Naomi<WH5281>, thou must buy<WH7069> it also of Ruth<WH7327> the Moabitess<WH4125>, the wife<WH802> of the dead<WH4191>, to raise up<WH6965> the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> upon his inheritance<WH5159>.

And the kinsman<WH1350> said<WH559>, I cannot<WH3201> redeem<WH1350> it for myself, lest I mar<WH7843> mine own inheritance<WH5159>: redeem<WH1350> thou my right<WH1353> to thyself; for I cannot<WH3201> redeem<WH1350> it.

Now this was the manner in former time<WH6440> in Israel<WH3478> concerning redeeming<WH1353> and concerning changing<WH8545>, for to confirm<WH6965> all things<WH1697>; a man<WH376> plucked off<WH8025> his shoe<WH5275>, and gave<WH5414> it to his neighbour<WH7453>: and this was a testimony<WH8584> in Israel<WH3478>.
Therefore the kinsman<WH1350> said<WH559> unto Boaz<WH1162>, Buy<WH7069> it for thee. So he drew off<WH8025> his shoe<WH5275>.

And Boaz<WH1162> said<WH559> unto the elders<WH2205>, and unto all the people<WH5971>, Ye are witnesses<WH5707> this day<WH3117>, that I have bought<WH7069> all that was Elimelech's<WH458>, and all that was Chilion's<WH3630> and Mahlon's<WH4248>, of the hand<WH3027> of Naomi<WH5281>.

Moreover Ruth<WH7327> the Moabitess<WH4125>, the wife<WH802> of Mahlon<WH4248>, have I purchased<WH7069> to be my wife<WH802>, to raise up<WH6965> the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> upon his inheritance<WH5159>, that the name<WH8034> of the dead<WH4191> be not cut off<WH3772> from among<WH5973> his brethren<WH251>, and from the gate<WH8179> of his place<WH4725>: ye are witnesses<WH5707> this day<WH3117>.

And all the people<WH5971> that were in the gate<WH8179>, and the elders<WH2205>, said<WH559>, We are witnesses<WH5707>. The LORD<WH3068> make<WH5414> the woman<WH802> that is come<WH935> into thine house<WH1004> like Rachel<WH7354> and like Leah<WH3812>, which two<WH8147> did build<WH1129> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478>: and do<WH6213> thou worthily<WH2428> in Ephratah<WH672>, and be famous<WH7121> <WH8034> in Bethlehem<WH1035>: do thou: or, get thee riches, or, power be famous: Heb. proclaim thy name

And let thy house<WH1004> be like the house<WH1004> of Pharez<WH6557>, whom Tamar<WH8559> bare<WH3205> unto Judah<WH3063>, of the seed<WH2233> which the LORD<WH3068> shall give<WH5414> thee of this young woman<WH5291>.
So Boaz<WH1162> took<WH3947> Ruth<WH7327>, and she was his wife<WH802>: and when he went in<WH935> unto her, the LORD<WH3068> gave<WH5414> her conception<WH2032>, and she bare<WH3205> a son<WH1121>.

And the women<WH802> said<WH559> unto Naomi<WH5281>, Blessed<WH1288> be the LORD<WH3068>, which hath not left<WH7673> thee this day<WH3117> without a kinsman<WH1350>, that his name<WH8034> may be famous<WH7121> in Israel<WH3478>. left: Heb. caused to cease unto thee kinsman: or, redeemer

And he shall be unto thee a restorer<WH7725> of thy life<WH5315>, and a nourisher<WH3557> of thine old age<WH7872>: for thy daughter in law<WH3618>, which loveth<WH157> thee, which is better<WH2896> to thee than seven<WH7651> sons<WH1121>, hath born<WH3205> him. a nourisher of: Heb. to nourish thine: Heb. thy gray hairs
And Naomi<WH5281> took<WH3947> the child<WH3206>, and laid<WH7896> it in her bosom<WH2436>, and became nurse<WH539> unto it.

And the women her neighbours<WH7934> gave<WH7121> it a name<WH8034>, saying<WH559>, There is a son<WH1121> born<WH3205> to Naomi<WH5281>; and they called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Obed<WH5744>: he is the father<WH1> of Jesse<WH3448>, the father<WH1> of David<WH1732>.
Now these are the generations<WH8435> of Pharez<WH6557>: Pharez<WH6557> begat<WH3205> Hezron<WH2696>,
And Hezron<WH2696> begat<WH3205> Ram<WH7410>, and Ram<WH7410> begat<WH3205> Amminadab<WH5992>,
And Amminadab<WH5992> begat<WH3205> Nahshon<WH5177>, and Nahshon<WH5177> begat<WH3205> Salmon<WH8009>, Salmon: or, Salmah
And Salmon<WH8012> begat<WH3205> Boaz<WH1162>, and Boaz<WH1162> begat<WH3205> Obed<WH5744>,
